subject: Theorize looking for a quickie? Check out our girls
body: .Well, it.s your life. But don.t say with your dying breath that you weren.t warned. I.ll bring you in.but only if you agree to stay in your ship. I.ll come out to you; that way you have a fifty-fifty chance that the decontamination cycling in your spacelock will kill the local microscopic life..
